thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
The Art of the Nuclear Deal
The Journal reports that President Trump will tell Kim Jong Un when they meet for a summit that North Korea must act quickly to dismantle its nuclear arsenal before the U.S. will discuss sanctions relief. Two closely related questions—the pace of Pyongyang’s nuclear dismantlement and the timetable for sanctions relief—stand to be the major issues of the meeting. The administration favors a “big bang” approach, in which major concessions would be made by each side early on. Mr. Kim announced...
